_metadata.description: Voice recognition difficulty annotations for telecom user data fields

authentication_methods.phone_number: Customer identified by phone number (digits spoken clearly)
authentication_methods.name_dob: Customer identified by full name with date of birth verification

first_names.source: U.S. Social Security Administration - Baby Names

last_names.source: U.S. Census Bureau - Frequently Occurring Surnames

levels.hard: Low likelihood of correct transcription without spelling

logic.easy: Standard phone number, digits spoken clearly
logic.medium: Contains repeated digit patterns (triple+ outside 555 prefix, or quad+ anywhere)

phone_number.notes: 555 prefix is standard fictional number format, not counted as problematic triple

names.description: First and last names scored by risk factors

has_common_homophones.description: Names with genuinely common alternative spellings
